pages.text:
This modpack features $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/dynamictrees)Dynamic Trees/$, which adds beautiful looking, gradually growing trees than can be chopped down by breaking a single block, and even pruned if you so wish.$(p)Another mod, $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/twerkitmeal)TwerkItMeal/$, goes hand-in-hand with it, allowing you to twerk (repeatedly sneak) or sprint to grow plants such as trees and $(item)kelp/$.$(br)              $(t:32x Oak Log
4x Oak Acorn)$(bold)[Requirements]/$

pages.title: Growing Tree
pages.text: Note the 'bonemeal' particles that appear around the tree.
